nodes.text: The planet Batonn's main continent was the location of Paeragosto City and the Creekpath Mining and Refining complex. Scrim Island laid three hundred kilometers to the west of Batonn's main continent. During the Imperial Era, Batonn's main continent harbored a rebel insurgency led by the insurgent leader Nightswan. The continent was also the site of the Siege of the Creekpath Mining and Refining complex, which ended both the Batonn insurgency and the Batonn sector insurgency in the Galactic Empire's favor.
